Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 220 Council

220.01Rules.

220.02Compensation.

220.03Clerk of Council.

220.04Forfeiture of office.

CROSS REFERENCES

General provisions - see CHTR. Art. IV

Powers re boards and commissions - see CHTR. Secs.9.01 et seq.

Annual report - see CHTR. Sec. 12.07

Continuation of Council - see CHTR. Sec. 13.03

Hearings against delinquent officers - see Ohio R.C. 733.35 et seq.

Action re final subdivision plats - see P. & Z. Ch. 1244

Duties re zoning appeals - see P. & Z. 1262.23
